short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Support-A-Creator extension lets you support creators you love while simply shopping online as usual.
short.hu: A Support-A-Creator kiegészítő lehetővé teszi, hogy a szokásos módon, egyszerűen online vásárlások közben támogasd a kedvenc…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Empower Your Favorite Creators with Every Purchase!

Unlock a new era of supporting your beloved content creators effortlessly! Say hello to Support-a-Creator, the revolutionary browser extension that allows you to monetize your everyday spendings without spending an extra dime. Fuel creativity, be part of a thriving community, and make a real impact on your favorite creators' success.

🌟 How It Works 🌟

Support-a-Creator is your gateway to empowering content creators while you shop online. Once installed, the extension seamlessly integrates with your favorite browsers, making it a breeze to use. Simply continue shopping as you always do, and behind the scenes, magic happens!

🛍️ Shop Freely, Support Passionately 🛍️

Our mission is to make supporting your cherished content creators effortless and rewarding. Whenever you shop at our partner stores, a percentage of your purchase automatically goes to the creators you follow. There's no additional cost on your end, and your everyday spending becomes a powerful tool for enabling your favorite creators' growth.

💫 Forge Stronger Bonds 💫

At Support-a-Creator, we believe in the power of community and genuine connections. Through our extension, you actively participate in your favorite creators' journey, building a stronger bond with them and their content. Your support directly impacts their ability to create captivating content, fueling their passion and inspiring more greatness.

🎉 Be Part of Something Bigger 🎉

Join our growing community of like-minded supporters and content creators who share a common vision: to uplift and empower one another. Together, we shape the future of online content creation, where artists, influencers, and creators thrive with the support of their dedicated fans.

🚀 Embrace the Future of Support 🚀

Support-a-Creator is not just an extension; it's a movement! Embrace a future where creators can focus on what they do best – creating inspiring content for you – while you contribute to their success effortlessly. Say goodbye to intrusive ads and paywalls, and let your shopping decisions make a real impact.

👉 Install Support-a-Creator now and witness the magic unfold with every purchase! Your support matters, and it's time to shape a brighter future for content creators together. Let's make a difference, one click at a time.

Support-a-Creator: Empower, Engage, Inspire.
